tool_description: Creates visual representations of execution plans including tree diagrams, cost flow charts, and interactive plan explorers for better understanding of query execution.

parsed_plan.description: Structured plan data from Plan Parser

visualization_type.description: Type of visualization (tree, flowchart, timeline, heatmap)

include_costs.description: Whether to include cost information in visualization

include_cardinalities.description: Whether to include row count estimates in visualization

color_scheme.description: Color scheme for visualization (default, colorblind, monochrome)

error_messages: Invalid parsed plan: Plan data is malformed or incomplete for visualization.
Unsupported visualization type: Use one of [tree, flowchart, timeline, heatmap].
Invalid color scheme: Use one of [default, colorblind, monochrome].
Visualization generation failed: Unable to create visualization from provided data.
usage: Provide structured plan data and select visualization type and options. The tool will generate a visual representation of the execution plan.

legend.description: Legend explaining visualization symbols and colors

summary_metrics.description: Key metrics displayed in the visualization
